sentences.en: A power failure created an emergency in traffic and transportation.
sentences.cn: 停电使交通运输陷入紧急状况.

sentences.en: Campuses are usually accessible by public transportation.
sentences.cn: 通常乘坐公共交通即可到达各个校区。

sentences.en: He finally solved the difficulty of transportation.
sentences.cn: 他终于解决了运输的困难.

sentences.en: In the past, British convicts could be sentenced to transportation.
sentences.cn: 过去, 英国的囚犯可能会被判流放.

sentences.en: Normally, the transportation system in Paris carries 950,000 passengers a day.
sentences.cn: 正常情况下，巴黎的交通系统每天运送95万乘客。

sentences.en: Oxfam may also help with the transportation of refugees.
sentences.cn: 乐施会也会帮助运送难民。

sentences.en: The baggage was being rapidly stowed away for transportation.
sentences.cn: 行李正在迅速装载等待运输。

sentences.en: The city is providing free transportation to the stadium from downtown.
sentences.cn: 本市现在提供从市中心到体育场的免费交通。

sentences.en: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.cn: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

sentences.en: The fruit will not bear transportation to any great distance.
the transportation of dangerous chemicals by road
sentences.cn: 危险化学品的陆路运输

sentences.en: The transportation of goods by air costs a lot.
sentences.cn: 航空运输货物花费很高.

sentences.en: The transportation took off with its cargo at midnight.
sentences.cn: 运输机载着货物深夜起飞了.

sentences.en: Transportation and communications are becoming easier day by day.
Water transportation was outmoded by railroads and good pikes.
sentences.cn: 水上运输已因铁路和良好的税道而变得过时了.
